path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - IStep Token - v1.2.pdf

findings.title: DoS with (Unexpected) revert
findings.description: The contract may experience a Denial of Service (DoS) due to an unexpected revert.

findings.title: Gas Usage, Gas Limit and Loops
Invalid unlocked balance check in transferFrom
findings.description: In the transferFrom function, it is required that balanceOf(from) - locked > amount so users cannot transfer all their unlocked balance.

findings.title: Wrong unlock calculation in transferFromAndUnlock
findings.description: In the transferFromAndUnlock function, the unlocked amount is calculated incorrectly from lockBalances instead of locked, leading to incorrect balance updates.
